mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.url AS "url", a.thumbnail AS "thumbnail", pi.display_order AS "displayOrder" FROM ec_image a LEFT JOIN ec_product_image pi ON a.id = pi.image_id WHERE pi.product_id = #{id} ORDER BY pi.display_order DESC
